title: CM Bhagwant Mann meets PM Modi, seeks Rs 1 lakh-crore financial package for Punjab - The Tribune India
content:
1. CM Bhagwant Mann meets PM Modi, seeks Rs 1 lakh-crore financial package for Punjab  The Tribune India
  2. Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann meets PM Modi, demands ₹1 lakh crore financial package  Mint
  3. CM Bhagwant Mann meets PM Modi, seeks special financial package of Rs 1 lakh crore for Punjab  The Indian Express
  4. Demand for financial package: AAP’s lies stand exposed, says Sirsa  Hindustan Times
  5. Need your cooperation for national security, says Bhagwant Mann after meet with PM Modi  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann on Thursday sought special financial package worth Rs one lakh crore from the Centre for the revival of state’s economy besides ensuring holistic development in the state during his first meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi after assuming charge.
